name: Village Attack!
description:
🔊[ONLY ENGLISH BELOW]🔊 ‼ VIDEOGAME  FOR PC AND MOBILE‼ 🔊MY INSTAGRAM: gio.dev.ro🔊 ⚠ GAME STILL IN DEVELOPMENT[OPEN BETA] ⚠ ------------------------------------ 📣  HOW CAN I PLAY:

📣 Your Purpose is to destroy all the other villages by cliking them... ONLY if your PlatyerNumber(On the left) is greater than the EnemyNumber(On the Right)

------------------------------------

📣 CONTROLS:

📣 Touch: Attack

📣 Double-Touch: MapMode - Not MapMode

------------------------------------
